subScenes.name: 得知升职
subScenes.description: 同事告诉你升职，你表达祝贺并赞赏努力

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, you won't believe it—I just got promoted to team lead!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，你不敢相信，我刚升任团队主管了！

responses.text: No way! That's awesome—you totally earned it!
responses.text_cn: 真的吗？太棒了！你完全配得上！

responses.text: Congratulations! All your hard work finally paid off.
responses.text_cn: 恭喜！你所有的努力终于有回报了。

responses.text: Nice!
responses.text_cn: 厉害！

qaPairs.usageNote: 非正式场合用No way!更显热情

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks! I pulled a lot of late nights, but it was worth it.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 谢谢！我熬了很多夜，但值了。

responses.text: I know how hard you've been grinding—respect!
responses.text_cn: 我知道你有多拼，真心佩服！

responses.text: You've always been dedicated. This is just the beginning.
responses.text_cn: 你一直很专注，这只是开始。

responses.text: Cool.
responses.text_cn: 不错。

subScenes.name: 提议庆祝
subScenes.description: 你提议一起吃饭庆祝对方的成就

qaPairs.speakerText: We gotta celebrate this! Dinner on me this Friday?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 咱们得庆祝一下！这周五我请客吃饭？

responses.text: Absolutely! I’ve been dying to treat you anyway.
responses.text_cn: 当然！我早想请你了。

responses.text: That sounds perfect—I’ll bring my best toast.
responses.text_cn: 太好了，我带最棒的祝酒词。

responses.text: Sure, sounds good.
responses.text_cn: 好啊，行。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用gotta和on me更显自然口语

qaPairs.speakerText: I’m so grateful—this means a lot to me.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我真的很感激，这对我意义重大。

responses.text: You deserve every bit of it. Let’s make it a night to remember!
responses.text_cn: 你完全配得上，今晚要玩个痛快！

responses.text: I’m just happy for you. Drinks after work tomorrow?
responses.text_cn: 为你开心，明天下班后喝一杯？

responses.text: Yeah, congrats again.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，再恭喜一次。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用make it a night to remember提升氛围

subScenes.name: 表达敬佩
subScenes.description: 你分享对方成就对你的激励作用

qaPairs.speakerText: I’ve been watching your journey—you’ve inspired me to push harder.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我一直关注你的成长，你激励我更努力了。

responses.text: Aw, that means a lot coming from you!
responses.text_cn: 哇，你这么说我真的太感动了！

responses.text: I’m honored—I hope you’re proud of your own progress too.
responses.text_cn: 很荣幸，也希望你为自己的进步骄傲。

responses.text: Cool, glad I helped.
responses.text_cn: 不错，能帮上就好。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用coming from you强调对方认可的价值

qaPairs.speakerText: I’m just getting started—I’ve got big goals ahead.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我才刚起步，前面还有大目标呢。

responses.text: Then I’ll be first in line cheering you on!
responses.text_cn: 那我第一个给你加油！

responses.text: You’ve got the drive—I know you’ll crush it.
responses.text_cn: 你有冲劲，我相信你能搞定。

responses.text: Okay, good luck.
responses.text_cn: 好的，加油。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用crush it表达‘大获成功’更地道

subScenes.name: 告别收尾
subScenes.description: 对话结束前轻松告别，强化积极情绪

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, I’ve got a meeting in five—gotta run!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好了，我五分钟后开会，得走了！

responses.text: Go crush it! Text me after—let’s lock in dinner plans!
responses.text_cn: 去大干一场！开完会发我消息，定聚餐！

responses.text: Congrats again—have a great meeting!
responses.text_cn: 再恭喜一次，会议顺利！

responses.text: Bye!
responses.text_cn: 拜拜！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用crush it+Text me增强互动感

qaPairs.speakerText: You’re the real MVP—don’t forget to take a breath sometimes!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你真是真·MVP，记得偶尔喘口气啊！

responses.text: Haha, I’ll try—thanks for having my back!
responses.text_cn: 哈哈，我会的，谢谢你支持我！

responses.text: MVP? I’m just lucky. Talk tomorrow?
responses.text_cn: MVP？我就是运气好。明天聊？

responses.text: Got it.
responses.text_cn: 知道了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用have my back表达支持，更显亲密
